mapper.update:
UPDATE Material SET ticket_flg = 1 where material_id in
#{id}

UPDATE Material SET break_back_flg = 2, outline_time = current_timestamp where material_id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select `m`.`material_id`, coalesce(omr_notifi_no, sorc_no) as sorc_no, `m`.`esas_no`,`m`.`model_id`, `m`.`serial_no`,`m`.`ocm`,`m`.`level`,`m`.`reception_time`, `m`.`agreed_date`,`m`.`inline_time`,`m`.`package_no`, `m`.`storager`,`m`.`fix_type`,`m`.`service_repair_flg`, `m`.`section_id`,`m`.`wip_location` as wip_location,`m`.`direct_flg`, `m`.`am_pm`,`m`.`scheduled_expedited`,`m`.`scheduled_manager_comment`,`m`.`quotation_first`, `m`.`outline_time`,`m`.`break_back_flg`,`m`.`pat_id`, `m`.`ns_partial_order` FROM MATERIAL `m` WHERE `m`.`material_id` = #{material_id};

select `m`.`material_id`, coalesce(omr_notifi_no, sorc_no) as sorc_no, `m`.`esas_no`,`m`.`model_id`, `m`.`serial_no`,`m`.`ocm`,`m`.`level`,`m`.`ocm_rank`, `m`.`reception_time`, `m`.`agreed_date`,`m`.`inline_time`,`m`.`package_no`, `m`.`storager`,`m`.`fix_type`,`m`.`service_repair_flg`, `m`.`section_id`,`m`.`wip_location`,`m`.`direct_flg`, `m`.`bound_out_ocm`, `m`.`am_pm`,`m`.`scheduled_expedited`,`m`.`scheduled_manager_comment`,`m`.`quotation_first`, `m`.`outline_time`,`m`.`break_back_flg`,`m`.`pat_id`, `m`.`ticket_flg`, `mdl`.`name` as model_name, `ctg`.`category_id`, `ctg`.`name` as category_name, `ctg`.`kind`, `ctg`.with_case as unrepair_flg FROM MATERIAL `m` JOIN `MODEL` mdl ON `m`.`model_id` = `mdl`.`model_id` JOIN `CATEGORY` ctg ON `mdl`.`category_id` = `ctg`.`category_id` WHERE `m`.`material_id` = #{material_id};

SELECT material_id from material a
1=1
and a.break_back_flg = 0
and a.model_id = #{model_id}
and a.model_id in(select model_id from model where category_id = #{category_id})
and a.serial_no = #{serial_no}
and (sorc_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sorc_no}, '%') or omr_notifi_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sorc_no}, '%'))
and a.section_id = #{section_id}
and date_format(a.reception_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{reception_time_start}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(a.reception_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{reception_time_end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(a.inline_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{inline_time_start}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(a.inline_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{inline_time_end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and (a.outline_time IS NULL OR NOT a.outline_time < current_date) -- [TODO history]
and a.outline_time IS NOT NULL -- [TODO history]
and a.break_back_flg = #{break_back_flg}

select material_id from material_process
line_id = 14
and date_format(scheduled_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{scheduled_date_start}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(scheduled_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{scheduled_date_end}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT a.material_id, coalesce(omr_notifi_no, sorc_no) as sorc_no, a.esas_no, a.model_id, (select name from model where model_id = a.model_id) as model_name, a.serial_no, a.ocm, a.package_no, a.level, a.section_id, (select name from section where section_id = a.section_id) as section_name, a.scheduled_expedited, a.direct_flg, a.service_repair_flg, a.fix_type, a.wip_location, a.pat_id, (select Concat(p1.process_code," ",p1.name) from position p1 join production_feature p2 on p1.position_id = p2.position_id where p2.material_id = a.material_id and p1.line_id <>13 and p2.operate_result not in (5, 8) order by (1-ISNULL(p2.action_time)), p2.action_time desc limit 1) as processing_position, date_format(a.reception_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as reception_time, date_format(a.agreed_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as agreed_date, date_format(a.inline_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as inline_time, (select date_format(finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') from production_feature where position_id in (select position_id from position where special_page = 'quotation') and position_id != 101 and material_id = a.material_id order by finish_time desc limit 1) as finish_time, (select operate_result from production_feature where material_id = a.material_id and operate_result not in (5, 8) order by (1-ISNULL(action_time)), action_time desc limit 1) as operate_result, date_format(a.outline_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as outline_time, a.scheduled_manager_comment, coalesce(a.scheduled_date ,(select scheduled_date from material_process where line_id = 14 and material_id = a.material_id)) as scheduled_date, a.am_pm from Material a where a.material_id = #{id};

SELECT a.material_id, coalesce(omr_notifi_no, sorc_no) as sorc_no, a.esas_no, a.model_id, (select name from model where model_id = a.model_id) as model_name, a.serial_no, a.ocm, a.package_no, a.level, a.section_id, (select name from section where section_id = a.section_id) as section_name, a.scheduled_expedited, a.direct_flg, a.service_repair_flg, a.fix_type, a.wip_location, a.reception_time, a.agreed_date, a.selectable, (select date_format(finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') from production_feature where position_id in (select position_id from position where special_page = 'quotation') and position_id != 101 and material_id = a.material_id order by finish_time desc limit 1) as finish_time, date_format(a.outline_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as outline_time, a.scheduled_manager_comment, (select date_format(scheduled_date, '%Y-%m-%d') from material_process where line_id = 14 and material_id = a.material_id) as scheduled_date, a.am_pm, a.Quotation_first from Material a where a.material_id = #{id} and a.break_back_flg = 0;
SELECT material_id, model_id, fix_type, break_back_flg, inline_time, outline_time FROM Material WHERE omr_notifi_no = #{omr_notifi_no} ORDER BY break_back_flg LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Material ( omr_notifi_no, esas_no, model_id, serial_no, ocm, level, package_no, storager, direct_flg, service_repair_flg, fix_type, reception_time, am_pm, section_id, scheduled_expedited, agreed_date, inline_time, outline_time, scheduled_manager_comment ) VALUES ( #{sorc_no}, #{esas_no}, #{model_id}, #{serial_no}, #{ocm}, #{level}, #{package_no}, #{storager}, #{direct_flg}, #{service_repair_flg}, #{fix_type}, #{reception_time}, #{am_pm}, #{section_id}, #{scheduled_expedited}, #{agreed_date}, #{inline_time}, #{outline_time}, #{scheduled_manager_comment} );
mapper.select: SELECT date(ma.reception_time) AS reception_time, ma.ocm, ma.agreed_date, coalesce(ma.omr_notifi_no, ma.sorc_no) as sorc_no, ma.model_id, mo.name as model_name, ma.serial_no, ma.level, ma.service_repair_flg, ma.direct_flg, srm.service_free_flg, mp.arrival_plan_date AS arrival_plan_date_start FROM material ma LEFT JOIN (select * from service_repair_manage where material_id like '0%') `srm` ON cast(`ma`.material_id as char) = `srm`.material_id LEFT JOIN model mo ON ma.model_id=mo.model_id LEFT JOIN material_partial mp ON ma.material_id=mp.material_id WHERE ma.material_id=#{material_id} and mp.occur_times=#{occur_times}
select count(wip_location) from material where wip_location is not null and model_id = #{model_id} and level = #{level}

select count(1) from material where reception_time >= #{reception_time_start} and reception_time <= date_add(#{reception_time_end}, INTERVAL 1 day) and break_back_flg in(0,2) and fix_type in (1,2) and model_id=#{model_id} and level=#{level}

select count(1) from material where reception_time >= #{reception_time_start} and reception_time <= date_add(#{reception_time_end}, INTERVAL 1 day) and unrepair_flg <> 1 and break_back_flg = 0 and agreed_date is not null and model_id=#{model_id} and level=#{level}
mapper.update: update material set customer_id=#{target_customer_id} where customer_id=#{original_customer_id}
mapper.select: select model_id,serial_no from material where outline_time is null and break_back_flg in (0, 2);

SELECT material_id, omr_notifi_no, agreed_date, scheduled_date, level, fix_type, scheduled_expedited, series as kind FROM material ma join model mdl on ma.model_id = mdl.model_id where inline_time is not null and outline_time is null;

select material_id, reception_time, agreed_date, omr_notifi_no, -1 as break_back_flg, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, ma.model_id, mdl.name as model_name, serial_no, level from material ma join model mdl on ma.model_id = mdl.model_id where break_back_flg = 0 and outline_time is null and qa_check_time is null and level in (55, 56, 57, 59) and exists (select 1 from production_feature where material_id = ma.material_id and position_id = 00000000064 and operate_result = 2)
